triggers.title: Sparkly > Proactive Bulk Tickets > Solve Related Ticket
triggers.description: Solve Tickets flagged by Proactive Bulk Ticket's Review Related Tickets functionality.
triggers.raw_title: Sparkly > Proactive Bulk Tickets > Solve Related Ticket

triggers.title: Conversation Tracker - Remove inactive_chat when status changed
triggers.description: Remove inactive_chat tag when conversation moves to pending, on-hold, or solved
triggers.raw_title: Conversation Tracker - Remove inactive_chat when status changed

triggers.title: [Run First] [Slack & Ticket Update] to TSE pushback
triggers.description: Pushes to TSE transfer back to PS team due to "Exclude from Reporting" Product Area or Reason for Contact.  Or for having a default "Subject" value.
triggers.raw_title: [Run First] [Slack & Ticket Update] to TSE pushback

triggers.title: [Assignment] [New] Routing Priority One - ESS and Premium
triggers.description: Applies routing priority of 1 to ESS and Premium customers

triggers.title: [Assignment] [New] Routing Priority Two - Strategic
triggers.description: Applies routing priority of 2 to non ESS and non Premium customers that are Strategic (ARR 1M+)

triggers.description: Applies routing priority of 3 to non ESS and non Premium customers that are not Strategic (ARR 1M+)

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Customer APAC] Standard Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Standard Support Level and in Customer APAC to the APAC Standard Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Customer EMEA] Standard Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Standard Support Level and in Customer EMEA to the EMEA Standard Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Customer NASA] Standard Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Standard Support Level and in Customer NASA to the NASA Standard Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Account APAC / Fallback] Standard Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Standard Support Level and in APAC or have no geo to the APAC Standard Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Account EMEA] Standard Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Standard Support Level and in EMEA geo to the EMEA Standard Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Account NASA] Standard Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Standard Support Level and in LATAM or NORAM to the NASA Standard Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [APAC / Fallback] Trial Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Trial and in APAC or have no geo to the APAC SE Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [EMEA] Trial Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Trial and in EMEA to the EMEA SE Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [NASA] Trial Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Trial and in LATAM or NORAM to the NASA SE Chats schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Global] ESS / Premium Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are ESS / Premium Support Level to the ESS / Premium Tickets schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Global] Standard Support Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are Standard Support Level and belong to TSE team to the Standard Support Tickets schedule.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Global] TSE ESS / Premium Ticket
triggers.description: Sets tickets that are ESS / Premium Support Level to the ESS / Standard Support Tickets schedule.  This is to avoid alerting on weekends.  SLAs are still Calendar hours.

triggers.title: [Schedule] [Global] Chat AutoSolve
triggers.description: Sets the schedule for Product Specialist chats and tickets to be standard M-F business hours, even if ESS or Premium, for AutoSolve purposes.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Close Child Ticket and Remove Parent Link
triggers.description: Temporary trigger until all Child Tickets are cleaned up.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Close Child Ticket and Remove Parent Link

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Create Child Ticket
triggers.description: Messaging tickets with TSE team get a side-conversation child ticket created.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Add Parent ID to Child
triggers.description: Sets initial ticket fields for Child Ticket.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Add Parent ID to Child

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Remove Parent Ticket Tag
triggers.description: Temporary trigger until all Child Tickets are cleaned up.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Remove Parent Ticket Tag

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Add Child ID to Parent
triggers.description: Sets initial ticket fields for Parent Ticket.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Add Child ID to Parent

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Clean Parent Ticket on Re-opened Ticket
triggers.description: Temporary trigger until all Child Tickets are cleaned up.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Clean Parent Ticket on Re-opened Ticket

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate assignee comment from parent ticket to child ticket
triggers.description: Moves public comments from the Assignee to the child ticket.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate assignee comment from parent ticket to child ticket

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate customer comment from parent ticket to child ticket
triggers.description: Moves public comments from the Requester / end-user to the child ticket as private comment.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate customer comment from parent ticket to child ticket

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate Fields
triggers.description: Copies Assignee, Subject, Stage, Support Level, Dynatrace ONE Support Team, Account Geography, Reason for Contact, Product Area, Severity, Handover, OOO, and SLA Override to child ticket.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Add handover SLA if handover
triggers.description: Makes sure there is "handoff_to_tse_sla" tag present on child when in PS to TSE Handoff status.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Add handover SLA if handover

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Remove handover SLA if handover finished
triggers.description: Makes sure there is no "handoff_to_tse_sla" tag present on child when in Technical Support Engineer status.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Remove handover SLA if handover finished

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Pending Child
triggers.description: Propagates Pending Status to child ticket, with Current Summary and Next Steps.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Solved Child when transferred from TSE
triggers.description: Propagates Solved Status to child ticket on tickets transferred out of TSE.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Solved Child when transferred from TSE

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Initiate Field Propagation
triggers.description: When parent-child tickets are first made, we need to cause an initial propagation of data.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] On-hold Child
triggers.description: Propagates On-hold Status to child ticket.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Open Child
triggers.description: Propagates Open Status to child ticket.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate Prevent AutoSolve
triggers.description: Propagates the tag for preventing AutoSolve to the child ticket.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Populate Organization Name
triggers.description: Populate the "Org" field on the ticket with the current assigned Organization for all non-child tickets.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate Allow AutoSolve
triggers.description: Propagates the tag for allowing AutoSolve to the child ticket.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Solved Child
triggers.description: Propagates Solved Status to child ticket, with Resolution Action.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Clear Populate Organization Tag
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Clear Populate Organization Tag

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Populate Organization Name on Child
triggers.description: Populate the "Organization" field on the child ticket.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Populate Organization Name on Child

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Restart SLA with public comment
triggers.description: When ticket leaves Solved and into a non-Closed status, a public comment is needed to restart the Periodic Update SLA.
triggers.raw_title: [Child Ticket Management] Restart SLA with public comment

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate APAC Geo
triggers.description: Propagates the "apac" tag.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate EMEA Geo
triggers.description: Propagates the "emea" tag.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate LATAM Geo
triggers.description: Propagates the "latam" tag.

triggers.title: [Child Ticket Management] Propagate NORAM Geo
triggers.description: Propagates the "noram" tag.

triggers.title: [SLA] [New] Sev-1 SLA calculation
triggers.description: Set Severity 1 tickets to Urget for SLA calculation on ticket creation

triggers.title: [SLA] [Update] Sev-1 SLA calculation
triggers.description: Set Severity 1 tickets to Urget for SLA calculation on ticket update

triggers.title: [SLA] [New] Sev-2 SLA calculation
triggers.description: Set Severity 2 tickets to High for SLA calculation on ticket creation

triggers.title: [SLA] [Update] Sev-2 SLA calculation
triggers.description: Set Severity 2 tickets to High for SLA calculation on ticket update

triggers.title: [SLA] [New] Sev-3 SLA calculation
triggers.description: Set Severity 3 tickets to Normal for SLA calculation on ticket creation

triggers.title: [SLA] [Update] Sev-3 SLA calculation
triggers.description: Set Severity 3 tickets to Normal for SLA calculation on ticket update
